title: Mysterious Disappearance
story: A small town is upended when a beloved resident goes missing.
All eyes turn to the husband as the prime suspect, but is he really guilty?
With the town's dark secrets gradually exposed, the truth threatens

suspect.name: Husband
suspect.alibi: The husband claims he was at work during the time of the disappearance.
suspect.confirmation: Witnesses at his workplace confirm his alibi.

witness.name: Neighbors
witness.observation: They heard a loud argument coming from the couple's house the night before the disappearance.
witness.description: The neighbors describe the couple as seemingly happy, but quiet and reserved.

npcs.name: Best Friend
npcs.dialogue: The friend recalls a conversation where the missing person expressed doubts about the marriage.

npcs.name: Police Officer
npcs.dialogue: The officer mentions a history of domestic violence reports filed against the husband.

clues.Living Room: A broken picture frame lies on the floor.
clues.Kitchen: The missing person's cellphone is left behind, suggesting she didn't leave voluntarily.
clues.Basement: Blood stains are discovered on the floor.
clues.Attic: A hidden diary uncovers the missing person's unhappiness in her marriage.
